meanings.sent1: The pheromonal release from the flowers attracted many bees.
meanings.sent2: The pheromonal scent of the predator put the prey on high alert.
meanings.sent3: The pheromonal perfume created by the scientist was a big hit.
meanings.sent4: The pheromonal effect of the cologne made heads turn wherever he went.
meanings.sent5: The pheromonal emission from the skunk was unmistakable and pungent.
